name: Medics & Mechanics
description: Issue an order to 1 unit that has suffered casualties. Roll 1 battle die for each command card you have, including this card. For each die matching the unit's symobl or star, 1 lost figure of that unit is retrieved to duty. A unit may not gain more figures than it originally had. If the unit recovers at least 1 figure, it may also be issued an order.
